abstract: David W Dunlap Building Blocks column reflects on Abstract Expressionist Hans Hofmann, whose work is subject of exhibition at Bruce Museum in Greenwich, CT; notes that Hofmann's two mosaic murals are both located in Manhattan, highlighting richness of city's public art.
lead_paragraph: “Walls of Color: The Murals of Hans Hofmann,” is being shown at the Bruce Museum in Greenwich. His two mosaic murals are both in Manhattan.

headline.main: A Connecticut Exhibit Highlights the Murals of Hans Hofmann
headline.print_headline: A Hofmann Exhibit in Connecticut (but the Murals Are in New York)
